item.title: Image Processing - Connected Component Analysis
item.description: Ahh, theres a result. I’ve been working some image processing coursework trying to correctly label an B+W image with a different label for each object in the image…it’s taken ages!…. The basic premise is, go through each pixel in the image. If this pixel has a neighbour which is labelled, label it with that label, if two pixel neighbours labels differ, store the equivalence in a table and resolve it later.
